prompt: Playful, cute vector illustration with rounded shapes and soft shadows, pastel palette (mint, coral, sky blue, sunny yellow) on off-white background. Big central illustration, minimal text. Title text in top-left: 'Cached prefix'. No logos or brand names. A prompt bar split into a bright 'cached' segment with a check icon and a gray 'new' segment.
rubric: Uncached portion is visible for contrast.

improvements: Increase the brightness or saturation of the green cached segment slightly more to exaggerate the contrast with the gray new segment.
Add a subtle divider line or notch between the cached and new sections of the bar to further clarify the split.
Optionally reduce some background detail around the prompt bar so the cached/new control becomes an even clearer focal element.
grade.summary: All rubric items are met: the cached segment is clearly highlighted with bright color and a check icon, the uncached new segment is visible and gray for contrast, the title 'Cached prefix' is clearly readable in the top-left, and the overall style is playful, clean, and vector-based.
